Title: Requires state agencies to prepare an active intelligent speed assistance system plan for the equipment of all state agency vehicles with active intelligent speed assistance systems
Summary: Requires state agencies to prepare an active intelligent speed assistance system plan for the equipment of all state agency vehicles with active intelligent speed assistance systems, and to equip state agency vehicles with such systems by certain dates.
LawCode: Add ยง163-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring state agencies to prepare an active intelligence speed assistance system plan
